definition: medical puncture to extract bodily fluid (a tap)/body piercing/puncture
to wear/to put on/to dress/to bore through/to pierce/to perforate/to penetrate/to pass through/to thread
thorn/sting/thrust/to prick/to pierce/to stab/to assassinate/to murder

sentences.english: At 16 weeks, I was offered an amniocentesis test.
sentences.chinese: 16個星期的時候，我做了羊水穿刺測試。

sentences.english: Objective To introduce a simple and reliable way for atrial septal puncture.
sentences.chinese: 目的介紹一種簡單可靠的房間隔穿刺術方法。

sentences.english: Preoperative massive transfusion and pericardiocentesis are not advocated.
sentences.chinese: 不提倡術前大量擴容及心包穿刺。

sentences.english: Review Articles Post-Dural Puncture Bacterial Meningitis.
sentences.chinese: 硬膜穿刺後的細菌性腦膜炎。

sentences.english: Objective To appraise the clinic effect of mini-invasive drainage on hemorrhages cerebral apoplexy with herniation.
sentences.chinese: 探討微創穿刺引流對出血性腦卒中並腦疝的治療價值。

sentences.english: The exterior of the puncture needle outer tube is also provided with a jacket tube.
sentences.chinese: 上述的穿刺針外管的外面還有一套管。

sentences.english: The puncture needle is supported by a rubber double-ball triangle fixator to keep the needle from moving.
sentences.chinese: 穿刺針頭由橡皮雙球三角固定器支撐，保持針頭不動。

sentences.english: Venipuncture is a common method used to rescue and treat burned child.
sentences.chinese: 靜脈穿刺是搶救與治療小兒燒傷的常用手段之一。

sentences.english: Conclusion The ultrasonic guidance automatic biopsy method should are spreaded.
sentences.chinese: 結論超聲引導自動腎穿刺活組織檢查應推廣應用。

sentences.english: Amniocentesis is the standard prenatal detection procedure for aneuploidy .
sentences.chinese: 羊膜穿刺術是出生前檢測非整倍體的金標準。

sentences.english: Results PTBD was successfully performed in all the patients.
sentences.chinese: 結果全部病人經皮經肝穿刺膽道引流手術成功。

sentences.english: Nitrile gloves provide even greater chemical resistance and are less likely to tear.
sentences.chinese: 丁腈手套則能提供更好的耐化學性和防穿刺性。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the clinical value of B-Us-guided pericardiocentesis .
sentences.chinese: 目的探討B超引導下心包穿刺診治心包積液的價值。

sentences.english: Objective:To analysis the cytologic examination by CT - guided percutaneous needle aspiration biopsy of the lung.
sentences.chinese: 分析CT引導下經皮肺穿刺細胞學檢查結果。

sentences.english: Compares with the UFH group, the point of puncture ligature time reduces obviously.
sentences.chinese: 與UFH組比較，穿刺點壓迫止血時間明顯縮短。

sentences.english: Bone marrow trephine biopsy as well as smear for cytological examination were conducted.
sentences.chinese: 骨髓穿刺活檢同時作骨髓塗片檢查。

definition: to prick with a needle/to treat by acupuncture
to pour into/perfusion (med.)/to concentrate one's attention on/to teach/to inculcate/to instill
biopsy/abbr. for 活體組織檢查|活体组织检查[huo2 ti3 zu3 zhi1 jian3 cha2]
incision/notch/slit/gash/margin of a page/trimmed edge (of a page in a book)
slang/argot/private language used as secret code
